author: markt
msg: Fix https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=48616, a regression caused by the fix for https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=42390

The requirement for variable declaration also depends on whether or not a fragment helper has been used for the parent tag (if any). Where such a helper has been used, the variables must be redefined.
Test cases for both bugs and the JSP TCK pass with this patch applied.

author: niallp
msg: Port r830028 to 2.x branch - Reorder methods for consistency within package

author: markt
msg: Restore the current 6.0.x implementation so patch to fix 48616 will apply cleanly to 6.0.x

author: markt
msg: Add minimal version of test case provided by 'agharta' in for https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=48616
